long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser Notepad: Your Ultimate In-Browser Note-Taking Tool

Why Install Browser-Notepad?

1) Modern Text Editing:
Write, edit, and format your notes with a robust set of text editing tools directly in your browser.

2) Automatic Saving:
Your notes are saved automatically as you type, ensuring they are always up-to-date and secure.

3) Export Functionality:
Export your notes with easeâ€”save individual notes or all tabs at once with just a few clicks.

4) Light & Dark Modes:
Switch between light and dark themes to match your environment and personal preference.

5) To-Do List Integration:
Keep track of tasks and deadlines with the built-in to-do list feature.

6) Enhanced To-Do List Features:
Add Reminders: Set reminders for to-do items to stay on track.
Countdown Display: Visual countdowns appear on the screen to keep you motivated.
Notifications: Receive timely reminders for your to-do list tasks.

8) Multiple Tabs Management:
Manage different notes simultaneously with multiple tabs.
Reorder Tabs: Rearrange tabs to suit your workflow.
Rename Tabs: Double-click to rename tabs for better organization.
Close Confirmation: Prevent accidental loss of content with tab close confirmation.
Default Tab: The last active tab will be the default when reopening the extension.
Automatic Tab Naming: Tabs are named automatically (e.g., Tab1, Tab2) for improved organization.
